name: pickup
short_effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items. May also pick up an item after battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
